20110126222018.000|20110126222020.000|TR0|
20110126222020.000|20110126222023.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Well, obviously you -- you want 
20110126222023.000|20110126222025.000|TR0|to repeal it, but you've acknowledged it's 
20110126222025.000|20110126222027.000|TR0|unlikely in the next two years to be 
20110126222027.000|20110126222030.000|TR0|repealed, so why not take the president up 
20110126222030.000|20110126222032.000|TR0|on his offer last night to fix it, to make 
20110126222032.000|20110126222035.000|TR0|some improvements?  Are you willing to 
20110126222035.000|20110126222037.000|TR0|work with him on that?
20110126222037.000|20110126222039.000|TR0|
20110126222039.000|20110126222042.000|TR0|DEMINT:  Well, no, because you can't fix a 
20110126222042.000|20110126222044.000|TR0|system that's built on the wrong 
20110126222044.000|20110126222046.000|TR0|foundation.
20110126222046.000|20110126222049.000|TR0|
20110126222049.000|20110126222051.000|TR0|The health care bill that we've got now 
20110126222051.000|20110126222054.000|TR0|that the president passed is built on a 
20110126222054.000|20110126222056.000|TR0|government-control model, a collective or 
20110126222056.000|20110126222058.000|TR0|socialist-type health care system, and 
20110126222058.000|20110126222101.000|TR0|what we need to do is return to the system 
20110126222101.000|20110126222103.000|TR0|that we had between patients and 
20110126222103.000|20110126222105.000|TR0|physicians and fix that system. There were 
20110126222105.000|20110126222108.000|TR0|a lot of problems with it, a lot of people 
20110126222108.000|20110126222110.000|TR0|couldn't get health insurance, it was too 
20110126222110.000|20110126222113.000|TR0|expensive, but a lot of the problems were 
20110126222113.000|20110126222115.000|TR0|caused by bad government laws and 
20110126222115.000|20110126222117.000|TR0|regulations that that we could fix.
20110126222117.000|20110126222120.000|TR0|
20110126222120.000|20110126222122.000|TR0|So going back and fixing part of the 
20110126222122.000|20110126222124.000|TR0|health care bill is only going to make it 
20110126222124.000|20110126222127.000|TR0|harder to replace it with the right model. 
20110126222127.000|20110126222129.000|TR0| So there's going to be disagreement 
20110126222129.000|20110126222132.000|TR0|obviously, Wolf, and there's some parts of 
20110126222132.000|20110126222134.000|TR0|this that affect small businesses that we 
20110126222134.000|20110126222136.000|TR0|need to fix, but the best way to do it is 
20110126222136.000|20110126222139.000|TR0|to throw out Obamacare and then move in a 
20110126222139.000|20110126222141.000|TR0|step-by-step approach to make the current 
20110126222141.000|20110126222143.000|TR0|health care system work better.
20110126222143.000|20110126222146.000|TR0|
20110126222146.000|20110126222148.000|TR0|BLITZER:  The -- the point that you're 
20110126222148.000|20110126222151.000|TR0|making about collectivist, socialist 
20110126222151.000|20110126222153.000|TR0|health care, they dropped the so-called

20110126222934.000|20110126222936.000|TR0|Firearms, more than 21,000 guns went

20110126225506.000|20110126225508.000|TR0|Some congressmen saying it's not a good 
20110126225508.000|20110126225511.000|TR0|idea because it's potentially hurting job 
20110126225511.000|20110126225513.000|TR0|creation in our country.  And it's also 
20110126225513.000|20110126225515.000|TR0|offering too few choices in light bulb 
20110126225515.000|20110126225518.000|TR0|options for some people.       And that's 
20110126225518.000|20110126225520.000|TR0|led some people to probably, a little 
20110126225520.000|20110126225522.000|TR0|jokingly, call it "light bulb socialism."  
20110126225522.000|20110126225525.000|TR0|But in the end, what's going on here is 
20110126225525.000|20110126225527.000|TR0|this 2000 act, it's obviously in place.

20110126225530.000|20110126225532.000|TR0|bulb will be phased out for more

20110126225534.000|20110126225537.000|TR0|
20110126225537.000|20110126225539.000|TR0|And what you see right here is one of 
20110126225539.000|20110126225541.000|TR0|those options.  This is a compact
